There is no single course book, the most relevant general literature for the whole course:
J. Schiller, Mobile Communications, 2nd. ed., Addison Wesley, 2003 (deutsche Ausgabe: Mobilkommunikation 2nd ed., Pearson Verlag 2003)
B. Walke, Mobile Radio Networks: Networking and Protocols, 2nd ed., John Wiley & Sons, 2002 (deutsche Ausgabe: Mobilfunknetze und ihre Protokolle 2Bde.- nur Band 1, Teubner 3rd ed. 2001).
Cornelia Kappler, UMTS Networks and Beyond, John Wiley & Sons, 2009.
A. Goldsmith, “Wireless Communications”, Cambridge University Press, 2005.
M. Gast, 802.11 Wireless Networks: The Definitive Guide Creating and Administering Wireless Networks, 2nd edition, O'Reilly Media, 2005.
M. Gast, 802.11ac: A Survival Guide, O'Reilly Media, 2013.
